name: Tintin: Prisoners of the Sun
overview: On their return from Peru, some explorers have been stricken down by a bizarre illness. When Professor Calculus disappears in strange circumstances, Tintin decides to investigate. From the port of Westermouth to high up in the Andes, he will need to solve riddle upon riddle. Your adventures will be full of tough challenges. On your way to the Temple of the Sun you will find yourself behind the wheel of a car in a perilous race against time, chased by a devastating avalanche and even set adrift on a crocodile-infested river!
